img.alt: Students Celebrating The Arrival of Fall

div.p: Our school is known for our talented teachers and signature programs. Visit each school to gain more insight as to what makes our district truly unique.

img.alt: Elementary students practice taking online tests in preparation for state testing

p.meta: Tullahoma City Schools administers state-mandated tests each year, a required universal screener with at least two additional benchmark tests,and elects to administer the Pre-ACT to Sophomores.

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

blockquote.p: Tullahoma City Schools will follow the recommendation of Tennessee Governor Bill Lee and close our buildings for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Distance learning opportunities for our elementary, middle and high school students will continue to be provided through May 15th. Our TCS nutrition team will continue to provide meal pick up through May 22nd. Other services that have been provided during the closure will continue through May 15th.
